subs.text: I have a suggestion for an internet holiday.
When you think of a pronouncement you'd like to make, write it in your favorite "tiny little text box", but before you send it, add the word "freaking" between every word in the punchline.
The Arizona court decision wonâ€™t just have an effect on the politics of Arizona. It will have effect on the politics of the entire freaking United freaking States of freaking America.
